name: Soumyajit Ghosh
achievements: India’s youngest Table Tennis player to qualify for the 2012 London Olympics
Won U-21 Brazil Open title in 2013
3rd Lusofonia Games 2014, Goa – silver (singles), gold (mixed doubles), gold (men’s team), bronze (men’s doubles)

stories.title: Soumyajit Causes Third Round Surprise, Dents Swedish Hopes

name: Achanta Sharath Kamal
achievements: Multiple medal winner in all major events around world and 2006 Commonwealth Games gold medalist.
Arjuna award winner for Table Tennis in 2004

name: Mouma Das
achievements: Commonwealth Games 2010, Delhi – silver (team), bronze (women’s doubles)
Arjuna award winner for Table Tennis in 2013

name: Manika Batra
achievements: under-21 (youth) category of ITTF pro-tour Chile Open, 2011 - silver
Commonwealth Championship, 2016 – 2 silver and 2 bronze medals
